name: BIGFOOT
description: You have a unique opportunity to gather a team of friends or go on a solitary expedition to the forests of wild reserves and feel like a real hunter for Bigfoots.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (Only 64bit) Processor: Intel i3 8130U(2Cores, 2.3GHz) or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 730 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 (Only 64bit) Processor: Intel Core i7 (64bit) or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space
